data.lyric:
[ti:Die Young (Explicit)]
[ar:Roddy Ricch]
[al:Die Young (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Die Young (Explicit) - Roddy Ricch
[00:04.46]We got London on the track
[00:09.90]I'm in London got my beat from London
[00:11.30]I ain't tryna die young so I gotta ride with one
[00:14.08]Stood ten toes down in my Balenciagas
[00:17.00]He ran down on a n***a that's a shotta shotta
[00:20.56]Cold hearted n***a wet that blocka blocka
[00:23.55]Gotta keep it on me I don't wanna die young
[00:26.41]I rather be judged by twelve than carried by six
[00:29.78]How I'm gon' post bail Just look at my wrist
[00:32.46]Tell me why the legends always gotta die quick
[00:35.82]When I'm in traffic gotta slide with the beam on me
[00:38.82]Cause I keep 'bout ten racks bussin' out the jeans on me
[00:41.89]N***as be hating I'm rich it's all about the cream homie
[00:44.81]If I ever get caught lackin' they gon' slide
[00:47.95]Ever since I got the Rollie I ain't got the time
[00:50.76]Flawless diamonds n***as can't never block the shine
[00:53.81]They know I'm ballin' in the city like DeRozan
[00:56.74]Gotta keep my n***as 'round me I can't do the wrong friend
[00:59.84]I was knockin' down walls now they closin' in
[01:02.71]Hopped off the porch and then I hopped inside the Porsche aye
[01:05.62]F**k being the side n***a I'ma be the main course
[01:08.65]Whipped the Rolls like a young n***a made for it
[01:11.40]I ain't tryna die young so I gotta ride with one
[01:14.12]Stood ten toes down in my Balenciagas
[01:17.12]He ran down on a n***a that's a shotta shotta
[01:20.48]Cold hearted n***a with that blocka blocka
[01:23.35]Gotta keep it on me I don't wanna die young
[01:26.30]I rather be judged by twelve than carried by six
[01:29.95]How I'm gon' post bail Just look at my wrist
[01:32.35]Tell me why the legends always gotta die quick
[01:35.69]Tryna get my bag I had to go and make it happen
[01:38.81]Me and my dogs we was bussin' out them bandos
[01:41.81]Count out them hunnids then we throw it in the mattress
[01:44.69]Wrap it in plastic and throw it in the attic
[01:47.55]I be in the streets n***a I stand ten toes
[01:50.64]Any n***a in my situation woulda been fold
[01:53.75]We was trappin' out the basement made it back tenfold
[01:56.53]Gotta stay out the way that's why I'm always behind the tint for
[01:59.67]We was fighting fed cases remember I was 2 and 0
[02:02.65]N***a was fightin' depression sippin' syrup I was movin' slow
[02:05.49]I was down below but still I always kept my head up
[02:08.71]N***a gotta get my bread up I don't wanna die young
[02:11.36]I ain't tryna die young so I gotta ride with one
[02:14.07]Stood ten toes down in my Balenciagas
[02:17.28]He ran down on a n***a that's a shotta shotta
[02:20.43]Cold hearted n***a with that blocka blocka
[02:23.31]Gotta keep it on me I don't wanna die young
[02:26.41]I rather be judged by twelve than carried by six
[02:29.91]How I'm gon' post bail Just look at my wrist
[02:32.44]Tell me why the legends always gotta die quick
data.trans:
[ti:Die Young (Explicit)]
[ar:Roddy Ricch]
[al:Die Young (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:04.46]这首歌由London on da Track制作
[00:09.90]我在伦敦 London on da Track为我制作这首歌
[00:11.30]我不想英年早逝 所以我必须与帮派为伍
[00:14.08]穿着巴黎世家的鞋
[00:17.00]他是个冷酷的杀手 谁敢惹他 保证逃不掉
[00:20.56]冷血的家伙 身上带着枪
[00:23.55]必须随身带家伙 我不想英年早逝
[00:26.41]我宁愿被陪审团审问 也不要被抬棺人抬着
[00:29.78]我怎么交得起保释金 看看我的手腕上吧
[00:32.46]告诉我 为什么传奇人物总是死得那么早
[00:35.82]当我在街头拼命的时候 我必须随身带着家伙
[00:38.82]因为我身上的牛仔裤里塞了差不多一万块钱 太显眼了
[00:41.89]很多人恨我 我富有得很 都是因为钞票 兄弟
[00:44.81]要是我有朝一日落魄了 他们肯定高兴得很
[00:47.95]自从我买了劳力士 我的时间就变得宝贵极了
[00:50.76]完美无瑕的钻石 谁都挡不住它的万丈光芒
[00:53.81]他们知道我就像DeRozan一样 实力超群
[00:56.74]必须把兄弟伙带在身边 我不能交错朋友
[00:59.84]我摧毁了一座座高墙 功成名就之后 那些人就对我步步紧逼
[01:02.71]从家里出来 然后我坐上保时捷
[01:05.62]再也不做小混混 我要做大佬
[01:08.65]开着劳斯莱斯 好像这是我与生俱来的能力
[01:11.40]我不想英年早逝 所以我必须与帮派为伍
[01:14.12]穿着巴黎世家的鞋
[01:17.12]他是个冷酷的杀手 谁敢惹他 保证逃不掉
[01:20.48]冷血的家伙 身上带着枪
[01:23.35]必须随身带家伙 我不想英年早逝
[01:26.30]我宁愿被陪审团审问 也不要被抬棺人抬着
[01:29.95]我怎么交得起保释金 看看我的手腕上吧
[01:32.35]告诉我 为什么传奇人物总是死得那么早
[01:35.69]我想要挣大钱 我必须努力奋斗 实现梦想
[01:38.81]我和我的兄弟们 我们干着那生意 闯出一番成就
[01:41.81]大把百元大钞 一张一张数 统统扔在床上
[01:44.69]用塑料袋包好 然后扔进阁楼里
[01:47.55]我是混街头的 顶天立地男子汉
[01:50.64]很多人遇到我这种情况都会退缩
[01:53.75]而我们一路披荆斩棘 终于出人头地 得到了十倍的回报
[01:56.53]必须远离大家的注意 这就是我的车一直贴窗膜的原因
[01:59.67]当时我们面临着联调局的审查 那次真是惊险
[02:02.65]曾经我很抑郁 酗酒 步履维艰
[02:05.49]我曾经也是潦倒不堪 但我始终不低头
[02:08.71]我必须挣很多很多钞票 我不想英年早逝
[02:11.36]我不想英年早逝 所以我必须与帮派为伍
[02:14.07]穿着巴黎世家的鞋
[02:17.28]他是个冷酷的杀手 谁敢惹他 保证逃不掉
[02:20.43]冷血的家伙 身上带着枪
[02:23.31]必须随身带家伙 我不想英年早逝
[02:26.41]我宁愿被陪审团审问 也不要被抬棺人抬着
[02:29.91]我怎么交得起保释金 看看我的手腕上吧
[02:32.44]告诉我 为什么传奇人物总是死得那么早
